review: I enjoy using the fire tv. I am able to easily watch all of my Amazon movies and tv shows. The only drawback I can think of (actually 2) is I can't run the device through my blu-ray surround sound system. It may be able to be done, but I don't know how to hook it up. A minor drawback is with the tv I have, I have to change input unlike my single blu-ray with wi-fi where I can choose Amazon when I turn it on. Besides these two non-critical items, I thoroughly enjoy using this device! There are days at a time where I only watch from my Amazon Fire tv. I am very, very, very happy I decided to buy this!I also bought the mounting device and it mounts right on the back of my tv, so there are fewer obvious wires to see. This I am also happy I purchased!
